message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a valuable asset that I believe will be of significant benefit to you.  While I value this product at no less than $1,000,000, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,050,000. This price reflects the potential value I see in you as a long-term partner. Please consider this offer carefully, as I have another interested buyer ready to purchase at $1,000,000.
